title: 106_hr4531
content: The Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act is amended to include the Inland Empire Regional Water Recycling Project. The Inland Empire Regional Water Recycling Project, in cooperation with the Inland Empire Utilities Agency, may receive federal funding for design and construction. The Federal share of the project cost will not exceed 25 percent, and funds provided by the Secretary cannot be used for operation or maintenance. An authorization of $20,000,000 is allocated for this project. The Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act is amended to include a new section on Regional Brine Lines (Sec. 1636). The Secretary may carry out a program under the Federal reclamation laws to assist agencies in projects to construct regional brine lines in Southern California and San Francisco Bay/Santa Clara Valley. Federal reclamation laws allow the Secretary to assist water agencies in constructing regional brine lines in the San Francisco Bay and Santa Clara Valley areas of California. The Federal share of project costs cannot exceed 25% or $50,000,000, and for studies, the Federal share is 50%. Funds provided by the Secretary cannot be used for project operation or maintenance. The Federal share of project costs for constructing regional brine lines in California cannot exceed 25% or $50,000,000. Funds provided by the Secretary cannot be used for project operation or maintenance. SEC. 1637. LOWER CHINO DAIRY AREA DESALINATION DEMONSTRATION AND RECLAMATION PROJECT. This section further amends the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act by adding a new project for desalination and reclamation in the Lower Chino Dairy Area. The Secretary, in collaboration with various water agencies, will participate in the Lower Chino Dairy Area desalination project. The Federal government will fund up to 25% or $50 million of the project cost, with funds not allocated for operation or maintenance. Appropriations are authorized for project implementation. Conforming Amendment: The table of sections in the Act is amended to include a new item after section 1636. Sec. 1637. Lower Chino Dairy Area desalination demonstration and reclamation project.
